# -------------------------------------------------------------------
# Expressions to be included in unit tests.
# ~
# - Add an expression per line
# - Mark the line with a "x" if tests should be skipped (positive tests).
# - Mark the line with an "f" if the test should fail (negative tests).
# -------------------------------------------------------------------
SUM(bar)
Sum(bar)
Count(bar)
Count(Customers)
Sum([Sales])
Sum({$}bar)
Count({$}Customers)
Sum({1}bar)
Sum({1<foo>}bar)
Sum({1<Year=foo>}bar)
Sum({$}Sales)
Sum({$}Sales)
Count({$}Customer)
Sum({1}Sales)
x Sum({BM01}Sales)
Sum({$1}Sales)
Sum({1-$}Sales)
Sum({$_1}Sales)
Sum({$_2}Sales)
Sum({$_4}Sales)
Sum({$1}Sales)
Sum({$2}Sales)
Sum({$5}Sales)
Sum({$10}Sales)
Sum(Units*Price*1)
Sum(UnitPrice*Quantity)
Sum([UnitPrice]*Quantity)
f Sum([UnitPrice*Quantity])
Sum([UnitPrice]*[Quantity])
Sum({$}ItemsSold*ItemPrice)
